ComicInfo.Summary:
Issue #6 of this visionary, critically acclaimed, new, monthly comics tour-de-force continues with more of the enthralling stories and stunning visuals you have come to expect from renowned creator Barry Windsor-Smith. In Young Gods, Heros and Strangehands race among fields of blazing comets while the princess Adastra strives to end the curse that has kept her grounded. In The Freebooters, Axus shakes off a major funk by leading his loyal band on a raid of the Kalif's own palace. In The Paradoxman, Tristan Caine's plight at the hands of cryptic aliens takes on yet another eerie dimension. Find out how fresh and exciting comics can really be -- grab this sixth, great issue of Barry Windsor-Smith: STORYTELLER!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/barry-windsor-smith-storyteller-6/4000-43450/
ComicInfo.Title: Young Gods: Chapter Six; Young Gods: Chapter Seven; The Freebooters: Chapter Seven; The Paradoxman: Chapter Six
